node.title: NZ Post devastated over death of employee
node.description: The person who died after becoming trapped under their work vehicle in Wellington yesterday was a New Zealand Post employee.
node.content:
["The person who died after becoming trapped under their work vehicle in Wellington yesterday was a New Zealand Post employee.", "", "
File pic Photo: RNZ / Richard Tindiller
", "Police believe a vehicle rolled down a small bank and trapped the person just before 2.30pm yesterday in the suburb of Tawa.", "NZ Post chief executive David Walsh said the organisation is devastated to lose a team member in the tragic accident.", "Walsh said their thoughts are with family, colleagues and the wider NZ Post team at this difficult time.", "In a statement, police say a serious crash unit is investigating and no further information will be released until enquiries have been completed.", "The incident has also been referred to WorkSafe."]
